About Me

Hello my name is adrián, I am 23 years old, I am currently studying programming, I am a web developer and web designer.

My beginnings were with HTML and CSS, I realized that it was something that I liked. Today I am at a point with various knowledge of being able to carry out a page Web in conditions

Currently I am studying in the programming career, I also had the possibility of training myself with different knowledge through courses, and looking for information to learn by following different technologies.

I would love to be able to continue discovering new ways of working, and continue raising my knowledge both for what is Front-end and Back-end.

Knowledge

o HTML Y CSS

o JavaScript

o Bootstrap

o Sass

o Less

o Grunt/Gulp

o React

o Git

Portfolio

My beginning in web development, was with a website for a food court, in which only The products were displayed, along with their tastes and varieties. Everything that is shown on the page was done with HTML and CSS. This page had two versions, in which the first had certain parts of the design, which were not they fit well. The second version was much more pleasing to the eye, with different visual effects, made completely in CSS.

In this image you can see, the final version of the page, there were many changes to the first version, with zoom effects made in CSS, a photo gallery showing the different varieties of products. Some details were improved in what is the design, animations, information of the place, contacts with their icons, and a map was added to locate said establishment.

My first calculator, this same one has the characteristic that it is an application progressive web (PWA) that was made in react. After finishing the "react from 0" course, it was the project to strengthen my knowledge. Also use Bootstrap.

This portfolio will have new content, future projects, and practices. All the material will be uploaded here.

Coming soon.
